channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2024061579
item.description:
Report X-2024061579

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-28T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-25
  • City: HOLBROOK
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box came off the trailer dry, but you could tell the cardboard had been wet. The box was put into a red hazmat bin. when I came in to work to look at the hazmat, I saw the box was dry, but inside the cap to one of the glass 4-liter containers was loose and 2 liters of the liquid was out of the glass liter container. I tightened the lid and checked all the other lids to make sure they were all tight.

item.title: Report X-2024061520
item.description:
Report X-2024061520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: LATHAM
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AIR PACKAGE BROKE OPEN REQUIRING A REWRAP. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO INNER BOXES PREPRINTED LEVEL 1 AEROSOLS. EACH INNER BOX CONTAINS TWELVE AEROSOL CANS OF AX-IT BASEBOARD STRIPPER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 729443, E. A. MORSE CO. INC., 1210 ROUTE 9, CASTLETON ON HUDSON NY 12033-9686.

item.title: Report E-2024060488
item.description:
Report E-2024060488

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-01
  • City: MONTGOMERY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO CNW, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported 2-cups of UN1263 "Clear Acrylic Lacquer" was released from a 5-gallon metal pail caused by improper loading and impacting the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who confirmed they were comfortable cleaning the spill with PPE per the SDS.
